items.content_html: Color Tone Detector: Lightweight npm package to determine if a color (HEX, RGB, HSL) is dark or light. Easy integration, optimal performance. Ideal for UI design, accessibility, conditional styling. Install: npm install color-tone-detector. Contributions welcome. License: MIT.
items.title: p4nduxcv/color-tone-detector: Color Tone Detector: Lightweight npm package to determine if a color (HEX, RGB, HSL) is dark or light. Easy integration, optimal performance. Ideal for UI design, accessibility, conditional styling. Install: npm install color-tone-detector. Contributions welcome. License: MIT.
